result.execSummary:
All charges against Deandrius Lyndell Alexander in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Deandrius Lyndell Alexander is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Deandrius Lyndell Alexander

records.addlTxt:
Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn in court, defendant Deandrius Lyndell Alexander not in court, in custody.  Michelle A. Grasso appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Deputy Court Clerk: SD.  
Case set for jury trial.  State's essential witness failed to appear.  State has no alternative theory of prosecution.  Defense motion to DISMISS is granted by the Court WITHOUT PREJUDICE.
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion for Bail Reduction.  (Deandrius L. Alexander, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Defendant Deandrius Lyndell Alexander in court with attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Defendant Deandrius Lyndell Alexander in custody.  Claire E Zyber appeared for the State of Wisconsin. All parties appeared by video conference.
  Final pretrial proceeded.  State's offer stated on the record.  Defense rejects State's offer.  Case remains in jury trial posture.  Case is adjourned to 8-8-22 at 8:30 am for Jury Trial.
Motion and Notice of Motion for Dismissal from Defendant ( Deandruis Alexander # 2022005948 8885 South 68th St Franklin, Wi 53132)
Received and Filed:  Defendant's Motion in Limine
Defendant's Notice of Motion and Motion to Suppress Statement.  (Deandrius L. Alexander, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).
Letter from defendant addressing Attorney to obtain recording of hearing from 5/13/22.  (Deandrius L. Alexander, House of Correction, 8885 S 68th St, Franklin WI 53132).

Received and Filed:Letter from Defendant.
RETURN ADDRESS: HOUSE OF CORRECTIONS, 8885 S 68TH ST FRANKLIN, WI 53132

Attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn in court, defendant Deandrius Lyndell Alexander not in court, in custody.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
Case in court for defense motion to modify bail. Arguments heard. Court DENIED defense request to modify bail. Case remains scheduled for final pretrial on 7-21-22 at 8:30 am and jury trial on 8-8-22 at 8:30 am.
Received, Filed, and Forwarded to the Judge for review; Notice of Motion and Motion for Reduction of Bail
No Contact Order & Firearm Prohibition signed and filed.

Defendant enters a SPEEDY TRIAL DEMAND.
  Defense is requesting final pretrial and jury trial dates. Case is adjourned to 7-21-22 AT 8:30 am for final pretrial and 8-8-22 at 8:30 am for jury trial.

Defendant waived Preliminary Hearing.  Preliminary Hearing Questionnaire and Waiver received and filed.  Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial. *Defense acknowledges receipt of the Information, waives reading and enters a plea of not guilty on behalf of his client.

Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.
  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Deandrius Lyndell Alexander in court with attorney Kerri Terann Cleghorn.  Ryan Jay Michaels appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Havas, Branch 10.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed the complaint and found probable cause to hold the defendant for further proceedings.  DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Final pre-trial scheduled for July 21, 2022 at 08:30 am.  Jury trial scheduled for August 8, 2022 at 08:30 am.
